about_the_game:
In CARGO 19, your main objective is to take a contract in the hangar, which will specify how many resources you need to collect for your mission. Every decision you make matters! Explore various locations, gathering resources to create new sites: choose between rocky landscapes, dense forests, or rich mines. Each location offers unique resources, and you must plan your route carefully to maximize fuel efficiency and avoid damaging your ship.

Throughout the game, you will complete contracts, face various challenges, and upgrade your hangar. Roguelike elements add unpredictability to the game: each playthrough is unique, and every move requires careful planning. Explore the desert lands, gather resources, and carve your path to success.

Become a great pilot and explore the mysterious world of CARGO 19! Are you ready for the challenge?
detailed_description:
In CARGO 19, your main objective is to take a contract in the hangar, which will specify how many resources you need to collect for your mission. Every decision you make matters! Explore various locations, gathering resources to create new sites: choose between rocky landscapes, dense forests, or rich mines. Each location offers unique resources, and you must plan your route carefully to maximize fuel efficiency and avoid damaging your ship.

Throughout the game, you will complete contracts, face various challenges, and upgrade your hangar. Roguelike elements add unpredictability to the game: each playthrough is unique, and every move requires careful planning. Explore the desert lands, gather resources, and carve your path to success.

Become a great pilot and explore the mysterious world of CARGO 19! Are you ready for the challenge?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal supported GPU: Intel HD and Iris Graphics from the HD 4000 series or newer, Metal supported: AMD GCN-based GPUs, and Nvidia Kepler-based GPUs or newer
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: CARGO 19

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Immerse into the unique world of CARGO 19, where you play as a brave pilot navigating a spaceship through the wastelands! Explore diverse locations, gathering resources to fulfill contracts while carefully planning your routes and avoiding damage to your ship
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese
